name: Boring Man - Online Tactical Stickman Combat
description: Battle other 2D stickman online while jumping around like a lunatic and getting blown up into smithereens. With 70 weapons, Boring Man is the most chaotic and hilarious 2D online shooter on the internet. Customize game modes with highly flexible options and crazy mutators!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista, 7, 8 Processor: ~2.0GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 75 MB available space Additional Notes: Portforwarding experience required to host your own server.

reviews.review_text: Being a fan of Stickpage and Xgen Studios, I really like stickman games. Boring Man is one of my favourite stickman games. This game is a lot of different things. But it definitely aint boring!  8/10  PS, Thumbs up to the guy who made this! Keep up the good work!

A fast paced action side scrolling shooter that gives us nostalga from when we played stick page or other flash games. I would give this game a 8/10 beacuse it has every thing I like but graphics need to be updated just a little.

Don't let the name fool you, (heck, this isn't even tactical) this is actually really fun. Simplistic, Soldat style combat but with parkour added into the mix gives you basically a 2D Double Action but with weird weapons amid the realistic ones, and plenty of modes.

Amazing game. This game looks like a ♥♥♥♥♥♥ free game, but for everyone who has become addicted to an online stickman flash game, thats what this is but with level ups, online multiplayer or bots modes, tons of game modes, tons of customizable rules for every game mode, an editable online profile, and tons more fun. 8/8 would r8 gr8 again m8!
good but WE NEED SERVERS FOR GAMES but we dont have those yet sooo  pretty much a brick now   4.10
Pros:   All around you is mayhem, enough said.  Cons:  I see alot of:  Kids  Edgy names  Noobs  Tryhards   But hey! It's a game. :) Still fun. Besides, whom am I to judge? :P
Somehow got 3 kills after dying Boring/10 better than infinite warfare.   (I said boring because its an oxymoron in this gaem)
before game-1/10 title not boring after playing-20/5 simulates the sensation of watching paint dry.

Bored outta your mind? Play this for awhile. It's a nice little game to play from time to time.  Warning: This game can become rather addicting, even though it's a very small game. I went from 5 hours to 20 to 40 and it's just so easy to get caught in it.  Protips: Mess around with loadouts, it's hilarious and can get you to the top of the leaderboard for the match. You can change your stickmans color in the options (hint hint Camoflauge) I was told you stop getting weapons at lvl 80 (makes sense, gonna see for myself.)  Personal favorites: Bow+sword, and double revolvers, kunai+double knives, suicide vest or kunai or boomerang and any of these loadouts with it.  'Give me back my loli !!!!' 10/10   - Angry Pandabear   (the stealthy guy with the knives that keeps killing you)

For new rookies & experienced hardcore players. You will have to realize like any other game as this be, will have some-what hack-cheaters, and real-deal smart hackers come and go. Some will hijack your server by cracking your code, and your server be stoled. I have played this before and after, and been in this 1-in-a-half year ago. Seen a poor player being hijacked and not be able get it back ever and felt sad for and with him on that issue. PvP is never good anymore these years and wars in streets after the election. Sh*t will never be the same no more. PvE in single player & with Cooperative play-style is always the best and gives best respects and careness, without hatred from PvP sh*t every f**kin time when so. This is an Up & down than a recommendation of this game. Private server is best for a start, so you can find and hope for an trusted person and more than one to join in the party.
Best Game Ever. If you don't play this i will physically find you and toture you untill you download it.

Even though the mechanics can be a little unfamiliar, once you master them, you realise how tactical the game really is. The mechanics with many buttons adds many options. You get to choose weapons that fit your style, and there are weapons being added every update. 5000000 / 10 Would get addicted again.
step 1 download game step 2 level up and get most op gun in game  step 3 rate 111 out of 110

Surprisingly, the game is quite solid (despite its simplicity). The controls are intuitive, responsive and smooth. Unfortunately, there are very few servers and they are often painfully laggy to the point where it is not worth to play. I'd consider playing again if the server issues are fixed
Ignore all the reviews complaining that it looks stupid, because stickfigures. It's actually really fun, the jumping is a bit weird but the whole thing works well.
Very Addictive Game, Everything is good in this game, except, the Servers, it's impossible to find a game, but out of that, its ok, I Allways liked games like this, keep going!.

i really enjoyed the game at first but now i can not join any servers. when i host a server nobody can join either (it might be about portforward thing and i don't know how to fix it). i'm waiting for things to settle down. good work dear developer.

This game is much more addictive and fun than it seems on the outside. After playing through it extensively, I am positive that it ranks as one of my favorite games. It is free, so it's not without its glitches, but they are not very noticable on the whole, nor do they distract from the fun that this game has. I defiitely recommend it to all players who enjoy shooter games. But don't take my word for it, try it out!

A suprisingly fun game where you, a stick man, must compete in an online multiplayer arena and face off against other stick men. with the standard indie game glitches.  10/10 if you are bored and need something new with a small download.
This is one of the few free 2 play games that are good. It is definately not a pay 2 win and deserves your time. And I assure you, it is not boring.

Boring Man, it isn't boring at all. It's fun and addicting. This game has become something that I like because of the hats and weapons. The option to color your stickman and a nice little reference to GOW because of the mutators. (GOW is Gears Of War.). But I don't have anything else at the top of my mind about this game,    9/10, why 9/10 you ask? Oh, dang- I don't really know why.

The game we always wanted back in high school computer science class... The best one of these stick shooters to date! Many weapons, many game modifiers, level editor/creator... There are tons of possible game types! The port forwarding is very simple, and should'nt deter you from playing this. However, for user friendliness and for a stronger following... It should probably be changed. If you want to start fighting other players within 60 seconds, this is probably a good choice. If you have 5 minutes to burn, or 3 hours.. Play it! No Pay to Pwn kinda junk either, I play as a free account currently. Every time you level you unlock a new, randomized weapon.
The loading screen's pretty cool...
Love it. Simple, Kill, Unlock, Kill More, Unlock More, Pinneapple, Perfect

How to play the game:  1. Call yourself 'Boring Man'  2. Join a game. You joined CTF  3. Ignore that it is CTF and play as if it was TDM  4. Shoot randomly off the screen in enemies direction. *Triple kill*  5. Repeat steps 2-4 until suicide vest is unlocked  6. Activate suicide vest and run into a group of enemies  7. Repeat steps 4 and 6 and become the true Boring Man
Fast-Paste, Explosions, Tons of guns... In one word, Awesome

A strictly multi-player stickman fighting game with fast paced gameplay and a now large following after Markiplier played it, Boring Man is, contradictory to its name, not boring at all. Games last for as long as the server host wants but usually the devs servers hold 15 minute matches spanning most, if not all, gamemodes. When starting you obtain a Pistol and a Machine Gun* as well as a regular grenade, but as you level up, the weapons you get are far more varied and powerful. Destroy everyone in Deathmatch with a Minigun, or survive for as long as possible in Zombies or Survival? Take your pick. This is a great game I would recommend to anyone who just wants an action-packed, fast paced game.   *May not be, can't remember

Reasons to love this game  Fast paced gameplay Stick figures Awesome dev /drink /warcry /crap ton of commands Simple graphics so you can run on potato OS Humor All the random idiots who play the game You can rocket jump You can rocket jump with a tazer You can shotgun jump You can assault rifle jump /smoke (420) Five year olds Forty year olds Swords Alotsofweaponslike40+atleast Rage quiting Suprisingly not borring Did I mention you can rocket jump with a tazer? Scuba diving Hats (needs premium) Premium is cheap Yearly weapon ballance  Seriously now. This is one of my favorite games. Its just a well ballanced game, with reliable game play and a good comunity. And the random unlock system insures that the game play is fair while forcing you to keep playing 'just one more level up.'  P.S. I was here before the markiplier fan rush. #HipsterGamerAF

Boring Man - Man, it's not bored!  First tbh. I feel like TF2 noob. I did join to the server and, died. Then I just feel like 'How the heck do people buy this premium?'. So, I jumped into singleplayer (Just host with a lot of bots) and giving a try. Woah man! It's pretty fun. Gaining a lot of levels and lots of guns just heal my feelings. And then I want to say 'It's amazing. Just giving a try' I wish this game could gone more far than this. (I'm not game reviewer expert, I apologize if I've done sth incorrectly.)
Can be run on a toaster, potato, computer and more! Oh and 10/10 does not lag unless it is raining. EDIT- SAVE WIPE WHY?! I WAS LIKE LEVEL 35!
Brilliant game could play this till i dropo dead

56 hours of gameplay, level 37 {or 47 cant quite remeber exactly} few guns left to unlock.   July 28th 9:40, I spot an update for /Boring Man Tactical Stick Combat\ pending, I stop all other updates and put it as the top priority. Seconds later its finished. I change the settings from /Manual update\ to /Auto Update\ feeling smart with my chioce to do so and open the game. I see the regular logo /Spasman games\. I see my Friend the floppy disk. Then the menu screen popped up.  The first thing I do everytime I boot the game is check how many points until next level. Something was absolutley WRONG. The thing i saw took my breath away /Level 0\ /0 xp\. MIND YOU I WAS LEVEL 37 WITH 56 FREAKIN HOURS OF GAMEPLAY. That day one of my favorite games was ruined.   Beside all that this game is super awsome and deserves a play!
I like this game.  This is a nice ♥♥♥♥ing game.  EDIT: Except for when something happens and I lose all of my weapons and levels...twice...

Have been following since early in development. Key word: 'Following'. I still play this game. It's actually a lot of fun, wish I had this to play in middle school too. This would have been my favorite game 5-6 years ago, now it's a great addition to my steam collection. And it's free.  PROS:  - Tons of replayability with tons of weapons and maps (with a map editor) - Play with your steam friends online, no hassle or annoying account creation - Freemium, and premium does NOT give any gameplay advantages! - Lots of servers and generally a good amount of players - Runs on basically any computer, no fancy system required. - Lore and ♥♥♥♥ for those interested  CONS:  - Fullscreen resolution is disturbing, or play in windowed mode and suffer - Lots of TCP Errors, minor annoyance, just try and reconnect it usually works the 2nd or 3rd time  OVERALLl: 75/100  Fix the resolution issues and TCP Errors and this will easily be 90/100. Nothing else really to complain about. I don't know how hard it would be to allow friend invites from within the game?  Anyways, get the game and try it for 10 minutes. Unlock some guns. If you don't like the game, delete it, no risk or loss. However, if you're like me, you will play this more than 90% of your other Steam games on a regular basis.
Very cool game

I'm sure you played this type of games before, when i first saw the game i was like dafq is this   (ﾟ⊿ﾟ), The controls was quite difficult from the start, but the longer you play you can move it with ease and starting to feel that the game is FUN!.  Going back to the point, Boring Man – Online Tactical Stick-man Combat is a 2d Stick-Fighting game, A game which you played in the past in Newgrounds or Y8. This game has a godly respawn timer which allows you to more bloodlusted. The game also have a variety of weapons you can choose on.    PS: You can use Pineapple to kill your enemies ¯\_(ツ)_/¯ *you mad bro ?*  Enjoyment: 7/10
The game is fun but servers lose connection after one game, but beside thatthe game is very fun.

This is a game. A stick based game. What i like about this game:  1. Multiple modes to play on including ZOMBRAINS/infection.  2. INTENSE MATCHMAKING

This game has a bit of lore you can look into, a nice 2D platforming style, and a FPS reflection all put in one. You have a numerous amount of different and wierd weapons, from a pineapple (yes I'm serious) to a big ♥♥♥ plasma launching cannon. This game has a DLC that does nothing except make you whine for more hats and premium options. This game is made for times when you are so bored that you would do anything for entertainment, this game is it, the entertainer, it's made for bored people, yet it's also made for casual and hardcore gamers alike. This game is 10/10, it's pretty good for a free game with pixelated graphics (just like Undertale, I recommend that game as well).
this game is soo awesome!!!

A Conversation between Friends...  Me: Dude, i found this game, and it's great. Him: I'm not buying you it. Me: No no, it's free, but i want you to try it.  (Gives link to Store Page)  Him: It looks stupid... I Don't know, man... Me: Just try it. Him: Ehhhh.... Me: Markiplier played it y'know... Him: Fine, i'll try it. But i don't expect much.  Is how i WISH it would have gone, but he refused.  However, I Enjoy the Game VERY much.  even though the servers can be crowded sometimes, but i can't blame Spas. The majority of the time I've spend in this game has been waiting for servers to open up...which never happens. The refresh on the server list can't even keep up with how fast the servers fill up. The servers are either at 20 people capacity maximum and full or locked. So until this issue is fixed, I do not reccomend it to anyone.

Pros: >The games free >Just about any weapon can kill anyone, hell maybe even a damn pineapple >level ups are quick and easy >You get to customize yourself. What stickman game has ever given you the freedom to do just that? (You gotta pay 5 dollars though) >Double jumps are cool >Maps are large and fun to play in >Matchmaking is great >When you level up, you get some random weapon. And most 'random weapons' include explosives, melee weapons, fruit, etc  Cons: >Small community. >It can be pretty difficult to find a decent server with the gamemode you want.  9/10 it's a great time waster, not going to lie.
